Verses: 1 raajaavaagiya Yerobeyaamin Padhinettaam Varushaththil Abiyaa Yoodhaavinmel Raajaavaagi,
2 moondru Varusham Erusalemil Raajyabaarampanninaan; Kibiyaa Ooraanaagiya Ooriyelin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Avanudaiya Thaayin Per Migaayaal; Abiyaavukkum Yerobeyaamukkum Yuththam Nadandhadhu.

3 abiyaa Therindhukollappatta Naalulatchamperaagiya Paraakkirama Sevagarin Raanuvaththaarai Yuththaththirku Aayaththampanninaan; Yerobeyaam Therindhukollappatta Ettulatcham Peraagiya Balaththa Paraakkiramasaaligalai Avanukku Edhiraaga Yuththaththirku Niruththinaan.
4 appozhudhu Abiyaa Eppiraayeem Malaiththesaththilulla Semaraayim Ennum Malaiyinmel Erinindru, Yerobeyaame, Ellaa Isravelare, Kelungal.
5 isravelai Endraikkum Aalum Raajyabaaraththai Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Dhaaveedhukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Maaraadha Udanpadikkaiyaaik Kattalaiyittadhai Neengal Ariyeergalaa?
6 aagilum Dhaaveedhin Kumaaranaagiya Saalomonin Oozhiyakkaaranaana Yerobeyaam Ennum Nebaaththin Kumaaran Ezhumbi, Than Ejamaanukku Virodhamaagak Kalagampanninaan.

7 peliyaalin Makkalaagiya Veenar Avanodekoodi, Saalomonin Kumaaranaagiya Rekobeyaam Avargalai Edhirkkak Koodaamal Vaalavayadhum Thidanatra Manadhumaayirukkaiyil, Avanukku Virodhamaaith Thangalai Balappaduththikkondaargal.

8 ippodhum Dhaaveedhudaiya Kumaaran Kaiyilirukkira Karththarudaiya Raajyaththirku Virodhamaaga Neengal Pelankollalaamendru Ninaikkireergal; Neengal Eraalamaana Koottam; Yerobeyaam Ungalukku Dhevargalaaga Undaakkinapon Kandrukkuttigalum Ungalidaththil Irukkiradhe.

9 neengal Aaronin Kumaararaagiya Karththarudaiya Aasaariyaraiyum Leviyaraiyum Thallivittu, Dhesaadhesangalin Janangalaippola Ungalukku Aasaariyargalai Undupannavillaiyo? Ilankaalaiyinaalum, Ezhu Kadaakkalinaalum, Thannaip Pradhishtaiyaakkumpadi Varugira Evanum Dheyvam Allaadhavaigalukku Aasaariyanaagiraane.
10 engalukko Karththare Dhevan; Naangal Avaraivittu Vilagavillai; Karththarukku Oozhiyancheygira Aasaariyargal Aaronin Kumaararum, Panividai Seygiravargal Leviyarumaame.

11 avargal Dhinandhorum Karththarukku Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Sugandhavaasanaiyaana Thoobaththaiyum Seluththi, Kaalaiyilum Maalaiyilum Parisuththamaana Mejaiyinmel Samugaththappangalai Adukkivaikkiradhaiyum, Pon Kuththuvilakkaiyum Adhin Vilakkugalai Saayankaalandhorum Etrugiradhaiyum Visaarikkiraargal; Naangal Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Kaavalaik Kaakkirom; Neengalo Avarai Vittu Vilagineergal.

12 idho, Dhevan Engal Senaapadhiyaai Engalodekooda Irukkiraar; Ungalukku Virodhamaagap Poorigaigalaip Perundhoniyaai Muzhakkugira Aasaariyargalum Irukkiraargal; Isravel Puththirare, Ungal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaaga Yuththancheyyaadheyungal; Seydhaal Ungalukku Siththikkaadhu Endraan.
13 yerobeyaam Avargalukkup Pinnaaga Varaththakkadhaaga Oru Padhividaiyai Sutrippogappanninaan; Appadiye Avargal Yoodhaavukku Mun Irundhaargal; Andhap Padhividai Avargalukkuppin Irundhadhu.
14 yoodhaa Janangal Thirumbippaarkkirapodhu, Munnum Pinnum Yuththam Nadakkiradhaik Kandu, Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittaargal; Aasaariyargal Poorigaigalai Muzhakkinaargal.
15 yoodhaa Manushar Aarppariththaargal; Yoodhaa Manushar Aarpparikkirapodhu, Dhevan Yerobeyaamaiyum Isravelanaiththaiyum Abiyaavukkum Yoodhaavukkum Munbaaga Muriya Adiththaar.
16 isravel Puththirar Yoodhaavukku Munbaaga Murindhodinaargal; Dhevan Avargalai Ivargal Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar.
17 abiyaavum Avanudaiya Janangalum Avargalil Magaa Sangaarampanninaargal; Therindhukollappatta Aindhulatchamper Isravelile Vettunduvizhundhaargal.
18 appadiye Isravel Puththirar Akkaalaththile Thaazhththappattaargal; Yoodhaa Puththiraro Thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Saarndhukondadhinaal Merkondargal.
19 abiyaa Yerobeyaamaip Pinthodarndhu, Avanukku Undaana Pattanangalaagiya Beththelaiyum Adhin Graamangalaiyum, Eshaanaavaiyum Adhin Graamangalaiyum, Epperonaiyum Adhin Graamangalaiyum Pidiththaan.
20 appuram Abiyaavin Naatkalil Yerobeyaam Balangollamaattaadhepoi, Karththar Avanai Adiththadhaal Maranamadaindhaan.
21 abiyaa Balaththupponaan; Avan Padhinaalu Sthreegalai Vivaagampanni, Irubaththirandu Kumaararaiyum Padhinaaru Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
22 abiyaavin Matrak Kiriyaigalum, Avan Nadapadigalum Avan Varththamaanangalum, Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Iththovin Sariththiraththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
